comments.text: Something I noticed from the trailer is that all the secondary antagonists for chapter 5 seem to parallel the antagonists from all the previous chapters. Huggy is back, Lily is a lot like mommy, the monster plushies are similar to the smiling critters and catnap, and the root monster(if it actually ends up being an antagonist) is very similar to doughy. It’s like chapter 5 is circling back to pay homage to each of the previous chapters before the final confrontation with the prototype. If that really ends up being the case. Then bravo Mob entertainment. BRAVO!
